name: Deathlock Wight
languages: the languages it knew in life

abilities.name: Source.
abilities.description: tales from the yawning portal,  page 233

abilities.name: Undead Nature.
abilities.description: A wight doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The wight's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no verbal or material components:
At will: detect magic, disguise self, mage armor
1/day each:fear, hold person, misty step

abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity.
abilities.description: While in sunlight, the wight has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
